meanings.definition: A substance that absorbs moisture from the air.
meanings.sent1: The hygroscopic in the laboratory kept the environment dry.
meanings.sent2: The hygroscopic in the food packaging prevented spoilage.
meanings.sent3: The hygroscopic in the warehouse was like a thirsty sponge, soaking up all the humidity.
